comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: ? same backdrop as here www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/10322309574/ I'd say this is Samuel Wild (and presumably Elsie and Tom as well)..Samuel has a very distinctive left ear...I think we see him here www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/10470510466/in/phot... and also here www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/10586384445/in/phot... Elsie and Beatrice Kerr had similar bracelets...maybe they were a dime a dozen at the time...or maybe it's the same bracelet, given by Beatrice to Elsie or v.v... So it looks like Tom Wild is the little boy we see with the teddy bear www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/10544730075/in/phot... ...looks like he inherited the Kerr ears (!)

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Yup that was my assumption too. Looking back again at the pictures of the young boy with the teddy bear, and even the baby in the picture with Elsie - its definitely the same boy!
